topics.title: Describe a Race You Have Joined
topics.prompt: Describe a race or competition you have participated in before.
topics.hint: 請學生說出參加過的比賽種類、地點、感受，大約3-5句。
topics.sample: I once joined a running race at my school. It was very exciting and I felt nervous at first. I tried my best and finished the race happily.

topics.title: How to Encourage a Friend
topics.prompt: Explain how you encourage a friend who is about to join a competition.
topics.hint: 請說明你會用什麼話語或行動鼓勵朋友，大約3-5句。
topics.sample: I would tell my friend to believe in themselves and do their best. I might say, ‘You can win this time!’ to cheer them up.

topics.title: Your Favorite Sport or Game
topics.prompt: Talk about your favorite sport or game and why you like it.
topics.hint: 請描述你喜歡的運動或遊戲，喜歡的原因，說3-5句。
topics.sample: My favorite sport is basketball because it is fun and very active. I enjoy playing with my friends and improving my skills.

topics.title: Describe the Feeling of Winning or Losing
topics.prompt: Describe how you feel when you win or lose in a game.
topics.hint: 描述贏或輸時的情緒和想法，可說3-5句。
topics.sample: When I win, I feel very happy and proud. But if I lose, I feel sad at first. Then, I try to learn from my mistakes.

topics.title: Explain How to Prepare for a Race
topics.prompt: Explain what steps you would take to prepare for a race or competition.
topics.hint: 敘述比賽前的準備過程，如練習、飲食等，3-5句。
topics.sample: Before a race, I usually practice running every day. I also make sure to eat healthy food and get enough sleep.

topics.title: Tell a Short Story About a Game You Played
topics.prompt: Tell a short story about a game you played with friends.
topics.hint: 講述與朋友一起玩遊戲的經過，包含情節與結果，約3-5句。
topics.sample: Last weekend, my friends and I played a skipping game. I tried to skip two jumps at once, but I lost. We laughed a lot and played again.

topics.title: Describe the Starting and Finishing Lines
topics.prompt: Describe what starting and finishing lines mean in a race.
topics.hint: 解釋比賽中的起點和終點線的意義，用3-5句說明。
topics.sample: The starting line is where all racers begin the competition. The finishing line is where the race ends and winners are decided.

topics.title: Talk About Saying Thank You
topics.prompt: Talk about when and why you say ‘thank you’ during a game or event.
topics.hint: 談論在比賽或活動中，何時何地說謝謝，原因，3-5句。
topics.sample: I say thank you when someone passes me the ball or helps me. It shows respect and good sportsmanship.

topics.title: Describe How to Be a Good Sport
topics.prompt: Explain what it means to be a good sport during a competition.
topics.hint: 說明比賽中如何保持友善與公平，約3-5句。
topics.sample: Being a good sport means congratulating others when they win and staying positive when you lose. It is important to respect everyone.

topics.title: Imagine a New Game You Want to Create
topics.prompt: Imagine and describe a new game you would like to create.
topics.hint: 創造並描述一個新遊戲，包括規則和玩法，3-5句。
topics.sample: I want to create a game where players pass a ball and race to the finish line. Players can skip some parts to be faster.
